product_name: CliniqueTake The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique's best-selling makeup remover Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips is a totally tugless formula that whisks away makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsDissolves and "lifts away" long-wearing makeup, even waterproof mascara.Non-irritating, non-stinging.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2153847How To UseShake makeup remover bottle well before usingSaturate cotton ballSweep onWipe offRinse with cool water before reapplying makeupIngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Trisiloxane, PEG-4 Dilaurate, Lauryl Methyl Gluceth-10 Hydroxypropyldimonium Chloride, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Phosphate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Dipotassium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake makeup remover bottle well before usingSaturate cotton ballSweep onWipe offRinse with cool water before reapplying makeup
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I Buy This Product On Repeat
reviews.comments: Best eye make-up remover. Leaves no oily residue.

reviews.headline: Great product poor customer service from Ulta
reviews.comments: This is my go to waterproof eye makeup remover. Doesn't require heavy scrubbing and leaves skin feeling nice. My last order from Ulta however took 12 days to arrive and customer service did not seem to care about the timeline. Each rep I spoke to said to check back tomorrow for a resolution as a delay tactic until the order actually arrived. I'll be purchasing elsewhere from now on!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: works great at taking off makeup love it

reviews.headline: Does not sting your eye and works great
reviews.comments: I have been purchasing this product for many years and will not buy anything else great product

reviews.headline: It's the best Prada does not sting your eyes
reviews.comments: This is the best for taking your eye makeup off does not burn or sting your eyes have been using it for many years will not buy anything else

reviews.headline: It is okay, not worth the price.
reviews.comments:
I am currently embarked on a quest to find the best makeup remover. My dream is to find one that cuts through all of my makeup in one swipe, leaves no residue, is easy to use, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed. Bonus points for cute packaging and good value!

Make up removing effectiveness: 3/5
I found I did not have to do a lot of scrubbing, but did have to do some.

Residue: 3/5
The residue isn't the worst, but it is definitely present and not pleasant.

Skin feel: 2/5
It doesn't sting my eyes themselves, but does burn a little on the delicate skin surrounding. It feels a little oily. 

Ease of use: 2/5
The child proof cap is a little annoying and I wish I had control over the rate it dispensed with a different cap. 

Value: Overpriced for what it does
Empty? Yes. I used my whole bottle. It works as intended, just not a holy grail.

reviews.headline: It's Been Around Forever for a Reason
reviews.comments: I have been using Take the Day off for decades. I've tried samples but they don't come close. I really love how it can easily take off hard to remove lipstick. Get it!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: I will never use another remover for my eye makeup. Only this one.

reviews.headline: The balm is better
reviews.comments: Get the take the day off cleansing balm instead! This isn't good at taking off makeup. It leaves a gross feeling after. Also burns the eyes. Micellar water is better

reviews.headline: Clinique take the day off
reviews.comments: I Love this product. I have used it for years with no issues. I have tried other products including other Clinique make up removers and I haven't found any that I like as well.

reviews.headline: Bottle cap makes this a 2 star product
reviews.comments: The bottle cap is the mist ridiculous thing ever. It makes me hate this product! Not accessible at all!!!!!

reviews.headline: The one and only
reviews.comments: This is by far my favorite eye and lip makeup remover. It never fails! Ive been using it for years.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I have used this for years, I love this product. Removes mascara easily, it does leave a little bit of a greasy residue, but at least I don't feel like I'm drying out my eyelashes. The bottle lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover
reviews.comments: This makeup remover works so good! Soft on skin and feels clean!

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover
reviews.comments: This makeup remover works so good! Soft on skin and feels clean!

reviews.headline: it feels like water
reviews.comments: It doesn't leave a film to my eyes that makes my eyesight blurry  for seconds

reviews.headline: Not sure if I would buy it sgain
reviews.comments: It does take the eye makeup off but I need to use twice as much as another product to get the same results.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail!
reviews.comments: the fastest way I've ever taken off my eyeshadow without much tugging. my new holy grail and I'm hooked. always loved clinque products and I'm adding this one to the bunch. my only gripe would be the price and the cap. The cap is so wierd, it's my only dislike of the product

reviews.headline: DONT BUY
reviews.comments: I have no idea if the product even works well as a makeup remover. Ive been unable to use it because the cap is un-openable! Ive tried everything. I even resorted to using pliers, a hammer, and a pocket knife to get the cap off. After finally getting the silver cap off, there WAS ANOTHER PLASTIC CLEAR CAP UNDER. Its STILL not off. Shame on you Clinique, make your produts user friendly. After a long day, I just want to get my makeup off - not hurt myself trying to get the cap off.

reviews.headline: I would by this product t again.
reviews.comments: I have used this product for many years. I wouldn't use anything else.

media.headline: Perfect solution for removing waterproof eyeliner!
media.caption: Bare faced

media.headline: The only makeup remover i use

faceoff_positive.comments: I got a sample of this in a gift with purchase. I don't like to use the product on my eyes because I don't like the residue it leaves plus I have sensitive eyes and it causes them to itch and tear up. I do however love it for lipstick removal. It's great for those gals who have little girls who like to play in mommy's makeup drawer and "paint" their faces with lipstick! It's easy to remove the lipstick without having to scrub your child's skin off!
faceoff_positive.headline: Lipstick Eraser

faceoff_negative.comments:
This does take eye makeup off like a dream, but there are some problems that make me less than likely to purchase it again. One, the smell is strange and off-putting (not that I'm saying put a fragrance in- please don't!- but it's still a bit unpleasant). It also leaves a pretty greasy finish that makes my face feel less than clean. Mostly, though, for me, the problem was that it's such a little bottle compared to other makeup removers, and it goes really quickly because it has a weird consistency that causes a lot of the product to get sucked into whatever cotton ball/wipe you use.

All in all, yes it's gentle- but it's not the most practical buy, and I won't be purchasing it again.
faceoff_negative.headline: It Does the Job- Pretty Greasy Though
